mapper.insert:
insert into music (mname, sid, type, myear, mimg, location, duration
) values ( #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myear,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 from music where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 from music
select m.mid,m.type, m.count, m.mname,m.myear,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and m.mname = #{mname}
select m.mid,m.type, m.count, m.mname,m.myear,m.aid,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid
select m.count, m.mname,s.sname,m.duration,m.mimg from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid order by count desc
select m.count,m.myear, m.mname,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid order by myear desc,count desc
select m.count,m.mname,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and m.type='流行' order by count desc
select m.count,m.mname,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and s.type='内地' order by count desc
select m.count,m.mname,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and s.type='港台' order by count desc
select m.count,m.mname,s.sname,m.duration from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and s.type='欧美' order by count desc
select m.count,m.myear, m.mname,s.sname,m.duration,m.mimg,s.type from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and s.type =#{type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by myear desc,count desc limit 0,6
select count(*) musicCount from music where sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mid, mname, sid, count, type, myear, mimg, location, aid, mvid, duration, state, discuss, mreserve1, mreserve2, mreserve3 musicCount from music where music.sid=#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select m.mid,m.count,m.myear, m.mname,s.sname,m.duration,m.mimg,m.mreserve2 from music m ,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and m.mreserve2 =#{mreserve2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct mreserve2, m.mreserve2,l.limg,l.lname,l.lintro from music m ,musiclist l where m.mreserve2=l.lid and m.mreserve2=#{mreserve2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select mname,sname,mimg,location,mreserve1 from music m,singer s where m.sid=s.sid and m.mname=#{mname}
